English: Weaken the armies of the Cyclops X and defeat their lieutenant to obtain one of their life gems and bring it to me.
Japanese: サイクロプス Xを弱体化させ、ジャイアントを倒しライフジェムを1つ手に入れ、私のところに持ってきてください。

English: Now stand back as I forge the key.
Japanese: 今鍵を繋ぎ合わせているところだ。ちょっと下がっててくれ

English: This is no time to play games. Go now and finish the task. We must hurry!
Japanese: 遊んでいる暇などない。今すぐ行ってこい！急いでいるんだぞ

English: I can't believe it. You achieved the impossible.
Japanese: なんてこった。不可能を可能にするとはこのことか。

English: Why are you still here? You must defeat the Red Meteonyker!
Japanese: なぜまだここにいる？レッドメテオニカを倒してこい。

English: I would say your victory calls for a celebration, but the armies of Shade are still here. There is a lot left to do in this forsaken place.
Japanese: あなたの勝利は祝賀に値すると言えるだろう。しかし、シェイドが創ったやつらはまだいるはずだ。この見捨てられた地にも、まだまだやることがたくさん残っている。

English: You are a lot more powerful than I thought you were. I am sure the other guardians are proud of your victory. I know I am. Thank you.
Japanese: 思っていたよりずっと強いんだな。他の守護者も勝利を誇りに思っているに違いない。心から感謝する。ありがとう。

English: The Red Meteonyker
Japanese: レッドメテオニカ

English: Here it is. The key has been reforged just as planned. Quickly now, go and defeat the Red Meteonyker before it's too late! You must fight through the hoard of undead guardians. Good luck.
Japanese: カギならここにあります。キーは計画通りに繋ぎ合わせてやったぞ。手遅れになる前にレッドメテオニカを倒しに行ってきてくれ。その前にアンデッドガーディアンの群れと戦わないといけんがな。生きて帰ってこいよ

English: I can't believe it. You achieved the impossible.
Japanese: なんてこった。不可能を可能にするとはこのことか。

English: Quickly now, go and defeat the Red Meteonyker before it's too late! You must fight through the hoard of undead guardians. Good luck.
Japanese: 手遅れになる前にレッドメテオニカを倒しにいってくれ！アンデッド ガーディアンに気を付けてくれ。無事を祈っているぞ。

English: Defeat the Red Meteonyker!
Japanese: レッドメテオニカを倒せ！

English: Master
Japanese: マスター

English: Master Grade (1)
Japanese: 修士課程 (1)

English: Reach level 70
Japanese: レベル70に到達する

English: Do you really think you’re the strongest? You’re wrong. You can be stronger! Listen... What if I told you that you could... relive certain moments of your life? It would be crazy, wouldn’t it?
Japanese: あなたは本当にあなたが最強だと思いますか?あなたは間違っている。あなたは強くなることができます!聞く。。。私があなたにできると言ったらどうしますか...あなたの人生の特定の瞬間を追体験しますか?それはクレイジーでしょうね。

English: I have a proposal for you. I take a few levels from you, of course temporarily, and you will accomplish a task for me. What do you have to gain? Everything!
Japanese: 私はあなたに提案があります。もちろん、一時的に、私はあなたからいくつかのレベルを取ります、そしてあなたは私のために仕事を成し遂げるでしょう。あなたは何を得る必要がありますか?すべてが！

English: I’m bringing you down to level 60, and when you get to level 70, come back to me! I’ll give you back your previous levels with a little gift.
Japanese: びっくりだベア！君のおかげでクリスマスは楽しく過ごせそうだベア！モンスターが雪だるまを壊したり、ニンジンを食べちゃわない限り！ベアベア！

English: Be careful though, your experience will be halved for the duration of this short mission!
Japanese: ただし、この短いミッションの期間中、経験値は半分になりますのでご注意ください!

English: Obviously, if you change your mind, you can abandon the quest at any time through your quest window and I will give you back your levels, of course!
Japanese: 気が変わった場合は、クエストウィンドウからいつでもクエストを放棄することができ、もちろんレベルを返します!

English: So, what do you think?
Japanese: それで、あなたはどう思いますか?

English: Perfect! I've taken your levels, come back to me when you reach the goal of our arrangement!
Japanese: 完璧ですね！私はあなたのレベルを取りました、あなたが私たちの決めた目標に達したら私のところへ戻ってきてください!

English: Oh I see... you’re probably too weak.
Japanese: ああ、わかりました。。。あなたはおそらく弱すぎます。

English: Wonderful! So I give you back your levels, and the little gift with it! Thank you for your help and see you soon!
Japanese: いいですね！だから私はあなたにあなたのレベルとそれとの小さな贈り物を返します!あなたの助けをありがとう、そしてすぐにお会いしましょう!

English: You haven’t been able to complete our arrangement? Too bad, others will!
Japanese: あなたは私たちの手配を完了することができませんでしたか?残念なことに、他の人はそうするでしょう!

English: Master Grade (2)
Japanese: 修士課程 (2)

English: Here you are again!? The last time was too easy... What if we put it back but a notch up?
Japanese: また来た!?前回は簡単すぎました..元に戻したが、ノッチを上げた場合はどうなりますか?

English: Like last time, I take your levels and you go back up! As simple as that!
Japanese: 前回と同じように、私はあなたのレベルを取り、あなたは戻ってきます!それと同じくらい簡単です!

English: And like last time, if you want to resume your previous progression, you can cancel the quest, you will resume the progression of the latter by resuming the quest!
Japanese: そして前回同様、前の進行を再開したい場合はクエストをキャンセルでき、クエストを再開することで後者の進行を再開します!

English: This time, it will be from level 70 to 80! So, shall we go?
Japanese: 今回はレベル70から80まで!それでは、行きましょうか?

English: Great! Then I’ll wait here!
Japanese: すごい！じゃあここで待ってるよ!

English: No problem, just come back!
Japanese: 問題ありません、戻ってきてください!

English: Great! I expected no less from you. Here’s your reward.
Japanese: すごい！私はあなたにそれ以上のことを期待していません。これがあなたの報酬です。

English: Reach level 80
Japanese: レベル80に到達する

English: Master Grade (3)
Japanese: 修士課程 (3)

English: The last time you finished your task in no time. What do you think? Let’s go back?
Japanese: 最後にタスクをすぐに終了したとき。どう思いますか。戻りましょうか?

English: The rules are not changing, so what are we waiting for?
Japanese: ルールは変わっていないので、何を待っていますか?

English: This time, it will be from level 80 to 90! So, shall we go?
Japanese: 今回はレベル80から90まで!それでは、行きましょうか?

English: Reach level 90
Japanese: レベル90に到達する

English: Master Grade (4)
Japanese: 修士課程 (4)

English: We’re almost done, don’t worry. But for now, let’s keep going?
Japanese: ほぼ完了です、心配しないでください。しかし、今のところ、続けましょうか?

English: And yes, as usual, same rules!
Japanese: はい、いつものように、同じルールです!

English: This time, it will be from level 90 to 100! So, shall we go?
Japanese: 今回はレベル90から100まで!それでは、行きましょうか?

English: Reach level 100
Japanese: レベル100に到達する

English: Master Grade (5)
Japanese: 修士課程 (5)

English: One more and then it’s the last!
Japanese: もう1つ、そして最後です!

English: This time, it will be from level 100 to 110! So, shall we go?
Japanese: 今回はレベル100から110まで!それでは、行きましょうか?

English: Reach level 110
Japanese: レベル110に到達する

English: Master Grade (6)
Japanese: 修士課程 (6)

English: Here we are! This is one of the last missions I have for you at the moment. Are you still motivated?
Japanese: 着きました！これが現時点で私があなたのために持っている最後の使命です。あなたはまだやる気がありますか?

English: This time, it will be from level 110 to 120! So, shall we go?
Japanese: 今回はレベル110から120まで!それでは、行きましょうか?

English: Reach level 120
Japanese: レベル120に到達する

English: Clockworks War
Japanese: 時計仕掛け戦争

English: Christmas Spirit
Japanese: クリスマススピリット

English: It’s almost Christmas, as you know. And I forgot to prepare my snowman...
Japanese: ご存知のように、もうすぐクリスマスです。そして、雪だるまの準備を忘れました。

English: Can you get me $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,2$ snowballs and $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$ carrots before midnight ?
Japanese: 真夜中までに$QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT、2$スノーボール、$QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$ ニンジンを手に入れてもらえますか ?

English: You can find the snowballs on the ground, but I think all the monsters picked them up... So you’ll have to eliminate a few to get them back.
Japanese: 雪玉は地面にありますが、すべてのモンスターがそれらを拾ったと思います..。したがって、それらを取り戻すには、いくつかを削除する必要があります。

English: If you’re not interested in the Christmas spirit, it’s useless.
Japanese: あなたがクリスマスの精神に興味がないなら、それは役に立たない。

English: You did it! Thanks to you Christmas is saved! Unless the monsters destroy the snowmen and take back the carrots...
Japanese: それをやりました！あなたのおかげでクリスマスは救われました!モンスターが雪だるまを破壊し、ニンジンを取り戻さない限り...

English: Well, I guess picking up snow and carrots is too hard for you, huh...
Japanese: まあ、雪やニンジンを拾うのは難しすぎると思いますね。

English: The polar bear asked me to bring back $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,2$ snowballs and $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$ carrots by midnight.
Japanese: ホッキョクグマは私に、真夜中までに$QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT、2$スノーボール、$QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$ニンジンを取り戻すように頼みました。

English: Welcome hero! Another request has come in to clear out $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ from the Forsaken Tower. Could you please slay 50 $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, and return to me once you are done?
Japanese: ようこそヒーロー！忘却の塔から$QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$を一掃せよと依頼が届きました。50体の$QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$を倒し戻ってきてくれないか？

English: Well done, we'll have plenty of $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$s to fulfill all the requests!
Japanese: よくやった、私たちはすべての要求を満たすためにたくさんの$QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$sを持っているでしょう!

English: You haven't defeated the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ yet? That's okay, just return once you have.
Japanese: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$をまだ見つけていませんか?それは大丈夫です、あなたがそれらを手に入れたらただ戻ってください。

English: Welcome back hero! There are reports of a new threat in the Forsaken Tower. Please seek out and get rid of the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$.
Japanese: おかえりヒーロー！忘却の塔に新たな脅威の報告がありました。$QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$を探して一掃してきてください。

English: Thank you hero, the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ threat has been eliminated.
Japanese: ありがとうヒーロー、$QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$の脅威が排除されました。

English: You weren't able to kill the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ yet? That's alright, please return after you've won against the giant!
Japanese: あなたはまだ$QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$を倒すことができませんでしたか?大丈夫、巨人に勝ったら戻ってください!

English: The Tower is filled with dangerous masquerpets. I understand if you do not wish to take the risk.
Japanese: タワーは危険なモンスターでいっぱいです。あなたがリスクを冒したくないのなら、私は理解しています。

English: Curiosity Killed the Cat (1)
Japanese: 好奇心が猫を殺した(1)

English: Curiosity Killed the Cat (2)
Japanese: 好奇心が猫を殺した(2)

English: Light as a Feather (1)
Japanese: 羽のように軽い (1)

English: Light as a Feather (2)
Japanese: 羽のように軽い (2)

English: Gullah Gullah Island! (1)
Japanese: ガラガラ島!(1)

English: Gullah Gullah Island! (2)
Japanese: ガラガラ島!(2)

English: Abraxas Antitoxin (1)
Japanese: アブラクサス抗毒素 (1)

English: Abraxas Antitoxin (2)
Japanese: アブラクサス抗毒素 (2)

English: Witch in the Tower (1)
Japanese: 塔の魔女 (1)

English: Witch in the Tower (2)
Japanese: 塔の魔女 (2)

English: Bird Assassins (1)
Japanese: 鳥の暗殺者 (1)

English: Bird Assassins (2)
Japanese: 鳥の暗殺者 (2)

English: Minotaur Maze (1)
Japanese: ミノタウロス迷路 (1)

English: Minotaur Maze (2)
Japanese: ミノタウロス迷路 (2)

English: Bead of the Black Magician (1)
Japanese: 黒魔術師のビーズ (1)

English: Bead of the Black Magician (2)
Japanese: 黒魔術師のビーズ (2)

English: Keys for the Piano (1)
Japanese: ピアノのための鍵盤 (1)

English: Keys for the Piano (2)
Japanese: ピアノのための鍵盤 (2)

English: Heart of Iron (1)
Japanese: 鉄の心 (1)

English: Heart of Iron (2)
Japanese: 鉄の心 (2)

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Catsy.
Japanese: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ は、任意のタイプのキャスティからドロップします。

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Harpy.
Japanese: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ は、どのタイプのハーピーからでもドロップされます。

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Gullah.
Japanese: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ は、どのタイプのガラからもドロップします。

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Abraxas.
Japanese: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ は、任意のタイプのアブラカサスからドロップされます。

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Hague.
Japanese: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$は、あらゆるタイプのハーグからドロップされます。

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Tengu.
Japanese: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ は、任意のタイプの天狗からドロップします。

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Asterius.
Japanese: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ は、どのタイプのアステリウスからもドロップされます。

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Dantalian.
Japanese: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ は、任意のタイプのダンタリアンからドロップされます。

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Gannessa.
Japanese: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$は、どのタイプのガネッサからもドロップします。

English: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ drops from any type of Asuras.
Japanese: $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ は、任意のタイプのアスラからドロップされます。

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the first floor of the Forsaken Tower.
Japanese: $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$は、忘却の塔の1階で発見されました。

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the second floor of the Forsaken Tower.
Japanese: $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$は、忘却の塔の2階で発見されました。

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the third floor of the Forsaken Tower.
Japanese: $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$は、忘却の塔の3階で発見されました。

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the fourth floor of the Forsaken Tower.
Japanese: $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$は、忘却の塔の4階で発見されました。

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the fifth floor of the Forsaken Tower.
Japanese: $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$は、忘却の塔の5階で発見されました。

English: Clockworks War (Medium)
Japanese: 時計仕掛けの戦争(ミディアム)

English: Clockworks War (Hard)
Japanese: 時計仕掛けの戦争(ハード)

English: Meteonyker
Japanese: メテオニカ

English: Meteonyker (Medium)
Japanese: メテオニカ(ミディアム)

English: Meteonyker (Hard)
Japanese: メテオニカ(ハード)

English: Forsaken Tower Daily Quests
Japanese: 忘却の塔デイリークエスト

English: Dungeon Card Reward
Japanese: ダンジョンカード報酬

English: Weapon Piercing Box (D)
Japanese: 武器貫通ボックス(D)

English: Weapon Piercing Box (C)
Japanese: 武器貫通ボックス(C)

English: Weapon Piercing Box (B)
Japanese: 武器貫通ボックス(B)

English: Weapon Piercing Box (A)
Japanese: 武器貫通ボックス(A)

English: Welcome hero! Another request has come in to clear out the boss masquerpets within Madrigal's dungeons. Could you please slay 5 dungeon bosses, and return to me once you are done?
Japanese: ようこそヒーロー!マドリガルのダンジョン内のボスの仮面舞踏会を一掃する依頼がまた一つ入ってきた。ダンジョンのボスを5体倒して、終わったら私のところに戻ってきてくれませんか?

English: Welcome hero! Another request has come in to clear out the boss masquerpets within Madrigal's dungeons. Could you please slay 20 dungeon bosses on Hard or higher difficulty, and return to me once you are done?
Japanese: ようこそヒーロー!マドリガルのダンジョン内のボスの仮面舞踏会を一掃する依頼がまた一つ入ってきた。ハード以上の難易度でダンジョンのボスを20体倒して、終わったら戻ってきてくれませんか?

English: Welcome hero! Another request has come in to clear out the boss masquerpets within Madrigal's dungeons. Could you please slay 35 dungeon bosses on Extra Hard or higher difficulty, and return to me once you are done?
Japanese: ようこそヒーロー!マドリガルのダンジョン内のボスの仮面舞踏会を一掃する依頼がまた一つ入ってきた。超高難易度以上のダンジョンボスを35体倒して、終わったら私のところに戻ってきてくれませんか?

English: Welcome hero! Another request has come in to clear out the boss masquerpets within Madrigal's dungeons. Could you please slay 50 dungeon bosses on Nightmare or higher difficulty, and return to me once you are done?
Japanese: ようこそヒーロー!マドリガルのダンジョン内のボスの仮面舞踏会を一掃する依頼がまた一つ入ってきた。ナイトメア以上の難易度でダンジョンのボスを50体倒して、終わったら私のところに戻ってきてくれませんか?

English: Collect souls from boss masquerpets at the end of any dungeon 5 times, and return to me for a reward.
Japanese: ダンジョンの最後にあるボスの仮面舞踏会から魂を5回集めて、報酬を求めて私のところに戻ってください。

English: Collect souls from boss masquerpets at the end of any dungeon on Hard or higher difficulty 20 times, and return to me for a reward.
Japanese: ハード以上の難易度のダンジョンの最後にあるボスの仮面舞踏会から魂を20回集めて、報酬を求めて私のところに戻ってきます。

English: Collect souls from boss masquerpets at the end of any dungeon on Extra Hard or higher difficulty 35 times, and return to me for a reward.
Japanese: 超難易度以上のダンジョンの最後にあるボスの仮面から魂を35回集めて、報酬を求めて私のところに戻ってきます。

English: Collect souls from boss masquerpets at the end of any dungeon on Nightmare or higher difficulty 50 times, and return to me for a reward.
Japanese: ナイトメア以上の難易度でダンジョンの最後にいるボスの仮面舞踏会から魂を50回集めて、報酬を求めて私のところに戻ってきます。

English: The dungeons are filled with dangerous masquerpets. I understand if you do not wish to take the risk.
Japanese: ダンジョンは危険な仮面舞踏会でいっぱいです。リスクを冒したくないのであれば、私は理解しています。

English: The threat from within the dungeons has been reduced thanks to you, hero. Please accept a weapon piercing card as thanks for your efforts!
Japanese: ダンジョン内からの脅威は、ヒーローであるあなたのおかげで減少しました。お礼に武器貫通カードを受け取ってください!

English: You haven't defeated the bosses yet? That's okay, just return once you have.
Japanese: まだボスを倒していませんか?大丈夫です、一度戻ればいいのです。

English: Collect souls from 5 dungeon bosses on any difficulty.
Japanese: 任意の難易度で5人のダンジョンボスから魂を集めます。

English: Collect souls from 20 dungeon bosses on Hard or higher difficulty.
Japanese: ハード以上の難易度の20人のダンジョンボスから魂を集めます。

English: Collect souls from 35 dungeon bosses on Extra Hard or higher difficulty.
Japanese: 超難易度以上の35人のダンジョンボスから魂を集めます。

English: Collect souls from 50 dungeon bosses on Nightmare difficulty.
Japanese: 難易度ナイトメアで50人のダンジョンボスから魂を集めます。

English: Daily Quests
Japanese: デイリークエスト

English: Saving Private Leo
Japanese: プライベートレオを救う

English: Private Leo has been trapped in the dungeon and sent an SOS sign!\nPlease save Private Leo!
Japanese: レオ二等兵がダンジョンに閉じ込められ、SOSサインが送られてきました!!プライベートレオを救ってください!!

English: Private Leo seems to be injured so please hurry!
Japanese: レオ二等兵が怪我をしているようですので、お急ぎください!!

English: I have misjudged you! I’ll look for another person, now begone!
Japanese: 私はあなたを見誤っていました!もう一人探してやる、さあ行け!!

English: I've heard Private Leo has been successfully rescued! Please accept this reward!
Japanese: レオ二等兵が無事救出されたと聞きました!!この報酬を受け取ってください!!

English: Has Private Leo been rescued yet?
Japanese: プライベートレオはもう救出されましたか?

English: Visit dungeon NPC to learn all about Event
Japanese: ダンジョンNPCにアクセスしてイベントのすべてを学ぶ

English: Rescue the missing childrens
Japanese: 行方不明の子供たちを救出する

English: The children from the town have gone missing... Please rescue them from the monsters!
Japanese: 町の子供たちが行方不明になった..モンスターから彼らを救出してください!

English: I need you to save $QUEST_END_TRIGGERCTRL_COUNT$ childrens in any dungeon, before midnight.
Japanese: 真夜中までに、$QUEST_END_TRIGGERCTRL_COUNT$の子供をダンジョンに保存する必要があります。

English: You can find childrens in any dungeon. They will be in a cage and you will just have to get the key from the boss to save them!
Japanese: どのダンジョンでも子供を見つけることができます。彼らは檻の中にいるので、ボスから鍵をもらって救うだけです!

English: If I'm right, children's lives don't matter to you? No problem.
Japanese: 私の考えが正しければ、子どもの命なんてどうでもいいの?大丈夫。

English: You saved the childrens! Thank you very much, you're my hero!
Japanese: あなたは子供たちを救いました!どうもありがとう、あなたは私のヒーローです!

English: Someone else saved them. You were too slow and incompetent.
Japanese: 他の誰かが彼らを救ったのです。あなたは遅すぎたし、無能だった。

English: I need to rescue $QUEST_END_TRIGGERCTRL_COUNT$ childrens in any dungeon by midnight.
Japanese: 深夜までにダンジョンで$QUEST_END_TRIGGERCTRL_COUNT$の子供たちを救出する必要があります。

English: Make Monster Shaved Ice
Japanese: モンスターかき氷を作る

English: It's definitely hot today.\nThere's a special food that can blow this heat away, do you want to know?
Japanese: 今日は間違いなく暑いです。この暑さを吹き飛ばす特別な食べ物があるのですが、知りたいですか?

English: Don't be surprised! It's Monster Shaved Ice!\nIt's a special recipe by me with monster ingredients.\nIf you want know how it tastes, go find the ingredients before the ice melts!
Japanese: 驚かないでください!モンスターかき氷です!モンスターの材料を使った私の特別なレシピです。味を知りたければ、氷が溶ける前に材料を探しに行こう!

English: You're not curious? You must not be too hot...
Japanese: あなたは好奇心がありませんか?暑すぎてもいけない...

English: Here you go! Hurry up and try it before it melts!
Japanese: はいどうぞ！！溶ける前に急いで試してみてください!

English: Oh why are you so late? Your ice already melted and it can't be used...
Japanese: ああ、なんでこんなに遅いの?氷はすでに溶けてしまっていて、使えません。

English: Are you still collecting?\nIf the ice melts, we can't make the shaved ice so hurry up!
Japanese: まだ収集していますか? 氷が溶けてしまうとかき氷が作れなくなるのでお急ぎください!!

English: Defeat the monsters before the ice metls and return to Sotta\n(Can redo the quest if failed)
Japanese: アイスメットの手前でモンスターを倒し、ソッタに戻る(失敗した場合はクエストをやり直すことができる)

English: Coral Island
Japanese: コーラル・アイランド

English: Clouds Over Coral Island
Japanese: コーラル・アイランドに浮かぶ雲

English: Hero, the clouds over the island to the southeast have finally cleared!
Japanese: 英雄よ、南東の島の雲がようやく晴れました!

English: For the longest time we have been unable to travel to the famed Coral Island. I wonder who or what caused the clouds to dissipate?
Japanese: 長い間、私たちは有名なコーラルアイランドに旅行することができませんでした。誰が、あるいは何によって雲が消えたのだろうか?

English: Regardless of the reason, perhaps you should go pay a visit to the island and see what's new.
Japanese: 理由はどうあれ、島に行って新しいものを見に行った方がいいかもしれません。

English: Many years ago a skilled blacksmith from Darken City named BoBu traveled through the fog in search for rare materials. Go seek out Coral Island and see if BoBu managed to survive.
Japanese: 何年も前、ボブという名のダーコンシティの熟練した鍛冶屋が、珍しい材料を求めて霧の中を旅したそうです。コーラルアイランドを目指しましたが、果たしてボブが生き残ったかどうか・・・。

English: I understand hero, Coral Island has been uncharted territory for many years... Come back to me if you change your mind.
Japanese: 私は英雄を理解しています、珊瑚島は何年もの間未知の領域でした..。気が変わったら、私のところに戻ってきてください。

English: Hello there traveler, I didn't expect to see one of you so soon after the clouds around Coral Island were lifted...
Japanese: こんにちはそこの旅行者、私はコーラル島の周りの雲が持ち上げられた後、すぐにあなたの一人に会うとは思っていませんでした..

English: Go seek out Coral Island and see if BoBu managed to survive.
Japanese: 珊瑚島を探しに行き、ボブブがなんとか生き残ったかどうか見てみましょう。

English: Find Your Bearings
Japanese: 方角を探す

English: Long ago I sailed into the mist that surrounded this island, hoping to discover something new and untouched in the land of Madrigal.
Japanese: 遠い昔、私はこの島を取り囲む霧の中を航海し、マドリガルの地で何か新しいもの、手つかずのものを発見しようと願っていました。

English: I found Coral Island nestled deep into the clouds, but something kept me from ever leaving.
Japanese: 珊瑚島は雲の奥深くに隠れていたが、何かが私を妨げていた。

English: The mist that covered the island held some magic that prevented those who arrived from escaping.
Japanese: 島を覆う霧には、到着した者が逃げるのを防ぐ魔法が宿っていた。

English: With Coral Island open to all, we may begin seeing more travelers arrive over time. For now, go introduce yourself to Sunny Pang. Sunny Pang will help you in your adventures around the island.
Japanese: コーラルアイランドはすべての人に開放されており、時間の経過とともにより多くの旅行者が到着し始める可能性があります。とりあえず、サニーパンに自己紹介しに行きましょう。サニーパンは、島を巡る冒険をお手伝いします。

English: Take your time, the island has a lot to offer. Come back to me when you are ready.
Japanese: 時間をかけて、島にはたくさんの魅力があります。準備ができたら、私のところに戻ってきてください。

English: Wow, it's a real adventure! It's been so long since we've had anyone come visit Coral Island. I wasn't sure this day would ever come!
Japanese: うわー、それは本当の冒険です!珊瑚島に遊びに来る人がいるのは久しぶりです。まさかこんな日が来るとは思っていませんでした!

English: Introduce yourself to Sunny Pang.
Japanese: サニーパンに自己紹介してください。

English: An Island Shrouded in Mystery
Japanese: 謎に包まれた島

English: Those who call Coral Island their home have been unable to explore the world due to a curse placed on the island many years ago.
Japanese: 珊瑚島を故郷と呼ぶ人々は、何年も前に島にかけられた呪いのために世界を探検することができませんでした。

English: The cause of the cursed mist that has kept the Coral Island inhabitants trapped is unknown.
Japanese: 珊瑚島の住民を閉じ込めた呪われた霧の原因は不明です。

English: However with the mist cleared from around the island, we can finally welcome fresh new faces to help us defend our small village!
Japanese: しかし、島中の霧が晴れたことで、小さな村を守るために、ようやく新鮮な顔ぶれを迎えることができます!

English: Coral Island is a dangerous place. To prove you are an adventurer capable of surviving the dangers here, I want you to go explore the island and take down 200 of any kind of Atrox.
Japanese: 珊瑚島は危険な場所です。ここでの危険を生き延びることができる冒険者であることを証明するために、島を探索してあらゆる種類のアトロックスを200体倒してほしい。

English: We didn't expect everyone that arrived to be strong enough for this place. Perhaps you can return to Darken City.
Japanese: 到着した皆さんがこんなにも強いとは思いませんでした。もしかすると、ダーコンシティに戻れる日が来るかもしれない・・・。

English: I am impressed! Atrox are dangerous beasts known to cut down most creatures that approach them. You have proven yourself.
Japanese: 感動しました!アトロックスは、近づいてくるほとんどの生物を切り倒すことで知られる危険な獣です。あなたは自分自身を証明しました。

English: Atrox are dangerous foes, you'll need to successfully defeat more of them to prove yourself to me.
Japanese: アトロックスは危険な敵だ、俺に実力を証明するには、もっと多くの敵を倒す必要がある。

English: Defeat 200 of any kind of Atrox, then return to Sunny Pang.
Japanese: 任意の種類のアトロックスを200体倒し、サニーパンに戻る。

English: Clear the Paths
Japanese: パスをクリアする

English: Word has been going around the village about a strong new visitor that can hold their own against the ferocities of Coral Island.
Japanese: 噂は、珊瑚島の獰猛さに対抗することができる強力な新しい訪問者について村を駆け巡っています。

English: The number of Tigars on the island have exploded recently, and we're not sure why. It's hardly safe to walk along the paths of Coral Island anymore.
Japanese: 最近、島のタイガールの数が爆発的に増えていますが、その理由はよくわかっていません。珊瑚島の小道を歩くのはもう安全とは言い難い。

English: If you are willing to help us, go hunt enough Tigars to keep our paths safe for a while. Around 300 should do.
Japanese: 手伝ってくれるなら、しばらくの間、私たちの道を安全に保つために、十分な数のタイガールを狩りに行ってください。300人くらいでいいと思います。

English: Perhaps no one is powerful enough to defeat the Tigars.
Japanese: おそらく、タイガーを倒すのに十分な力を持つ人はいないでしょう。

English: Incredible, thank you for your efforts! We can safely travel around the land paths of the island again.
Japanese: 信じられない、あなたの努力に感謝します!島の陸路を再び安全に移動できます。

English: Tigars hide in the grass, waiting to strike their prey. In just one NaNosecond they pounce to attack.
Japanese: タイガーは草むらに隠れて獲物を襲うのを待っています。たった1ナノ秒で、彼らは攻撃を仕掛けてくる。

English: Defeat 300 of any kind of Tigar, then return to Talus.
Japanese: タイガーを300体倒し、タルスに戻る。

English: Pirates and Their Pet
Japanese: 海賊とそのペット

English: Your reputation continues to grow in our little village, hero!
Japanese: あなたの評判は私たちの小さな村で成長し続けています、ヒーロー!

English: The Meral pirates of Coral Island have managed to tame a Lord Tigar. Those thieves have threatened to come rob and destroy our homes.
Japanese: The Meral pirates of Coral Island have managed to tame a Lord Tigar. Those thieves have threatened to come rob and destroy our homes.

English: Defeat the pirates and their gigantic pet before they destroy everything we've built!
Japanese: 海賊とその巨大なペットを倒して、私たちが築き上げたものをすべて破壊しましょう!

English: I wouldn't want to be eaten by a Lord Tigar either. Understandable.
Japanese: I wouldn't want to be eaten by a Lord Tigar either. Understandable.

English: I knew you could do it, hero! For now we can rest, knowing that our village is safe from the Meral pirates and their Lord Tigar!
Japanese: I knew you could do it, hero! For now we can rest, knowing that our village is safe from the Meral pirates and their Lord Tigar!

English: Merals and their pet Tigar are terribly powerful. You'll need to be strong to defeat them.
Japanese: メラルとそのペットのタイガーは恐ろしく強力です。彼らを倒すには強くなければなりません。

English: Collect 30 Pristine Pirate Lens from any kind of Meral, and a Gigantic Feline Fang from a Lord Tigar.
Japanese: Collect 30 Pristine Pirate Lens from any kind of Meral, and a Gigantic Feline Fang from a Lord Tigar.

English: King of the Pirates!
Japanese: 海賊の王!

English: Woaw, welcome to Coral Island hero! Let me tell you a story of legend, if you don't mind.
Japanese: うわー、コーラルアイランドのヒーローへようこそ!よろしければ、伝説の話をしましょう。

English: Long ago, a huge Meral was once blessed by Shade. The Meral grew twisted and grotesque, but filled with dark power.
Japanese: 遠い昔、巨大なメラルがシェイドに祝福されたことがある。メラルはねじれてグロテスクになったが、闇の力に満ちていた。

English: Soon the Overlord Meral became the King of the Pirates of Coral Island, ruling with an iron hook.
Japanese: Soon the Overlord Meral became the King of the Pirates of Coral Island, ruling with an iron hook.

English: Wehehehe, if you defeated that Overlord Meral maybe YOU could become King of the Pirates!
Japanese: Wehehehe, if you defeated that Overlord Meral maybe YOU could become King of the Pirates!

English: I guess we will never know if the legend of the Meral King is true.
Japanese: メラル王の伝説が本当かどうかはわからないだろう。

English: Woah woah woah! You defeated the King of the Pirates? And that stone...
Japanese: うわぁ海賊王を倒したのか?そして、あの石は..

English: It seems this one piece of stone is filled with purple magic... this is definitely the work of Shade.
Japanese: どうやらこの石には紫の魔力が込められているようだ。これは間違いなくシェイドの作品です。

English: Fufufu, the only thing that bothers me is that there is legend of a second piece of magic stone hidden on this island. Maybe one day the two of us will discover where it's hiding!
Japanese: ふふふ、唯一気になるのは、この島に2つ目の魔石が隠されているという伝説があることです。いつの日か、2人で隠れている場所がわかるかもしれませんね!

English: To find out if the legend is true, you'll need to defeat the Overlord Meral.
Japanese: To find out if the legend is true, you'll need to defeat the Overlord Meral.

English: Defeat the Overlord Meral to collect the Purple Pirate Insignia.
Japanese: Defeat the Overlord Meral to collect the Purple Pirate Insignia.

English: Island Delicacies
Japanese: 島の珍味

English: Ha! You have really made a name for yourself here on Coral Island, hero. Everyone has told me of the amazing feats you've accomplished.
Japanese: ハッ!ここコーラル島で名を馳せたな、英雄よ。誰もが、あなたが成し遂げた素晴らしい偉業について私に話してくれました。

English: If you want to prove yourself further, help us defeat the legion of Naga that have taken over the island.
Japanese: さらに実力を証明したいなら、島を乗っ取ったナーガの軍団を倒すのを手伝ってください。

English: To safely take on the Naga, first you'll need to gather bait made of their favorite foods. You can make bait from any type of Kingster or Creper! Meet up with Pau Pau and he'll prepare everything.
Japanese: ナーガを安全に捕らえるには、まずナーガの好きな食べ物で作られた餌を集める必要があります。どんな種類のキングスターやクレーパーからも餌を作ることができます!パウ・パウと会えば、彼がすべてを準備してくれる。

English: Everyone's adventure comes to a close one day. That's alright, hero.
Japanese: みんなの冒険はいつか終わります。大丈夫だよ、ヒーロー。

English: Woaw, nice job hero! We can make plenty of bait with all this to lower the guard of the Naga! For now, take a rest. We'll make a plan of attack later.
Japanese: うわー、ナイジョブヒーロー!これだけで餌をたくさん作って、ナーガのガードを下げましょう!とりあえず、お休みください。攻撃の計画は後で立てます。

English: Keep fighting Kingster or Creper until you've found enough bait.
Japanese: 十分な餌が見つかるまで、キングスターまたはクレパーと戦い続けます。

English: Defeat any kind of Kingster or Creper until you've made 200 Island Bait.
Japanese: 島の餌を200個作るまで、あらゆる種類のキングスターまたはクレーパーを倒します。

English: Lizard People
Japanese: トカゲの人々

English: I hope you're feeling rested after making all that bait with Pau Pau!
Japanese: パウパウで餌を作った後、あなたが休息していることを願っています!

English: It's time to go on the offensive and take down as many of the Naga as we can.
Japanese: 今こそ攻勢に出て、できるだけ多くのナーガを倒す時だ。

English: Okay hero, go out there and defeat the Naga before they come eat us!
Japanese: よし、ヒーロー、俺たちを食べに来る前にナーガを倒せ!

English: The Naga are ferocious, there's no shame in saying no.
Japanese: ナーガは獰猛で、ノーと言うのは恥ずかしいことではありません。

English: Incredible! Truly amazing! You've conquered the Naga, and nearly all of Coral Island!
Japanese: 信じられない！本当にすごい!ナーガ族とコーラル島のほぼ全域を制覇した!

English: Hopefully soon our village can sleep without keeping one eye open.
Japanese: 願わくば、早く私たちの村が片目を開けずに眠れるようになることを願っています。

English: Keep going! You need to defeat more Naga.
Japanese: そのまま頑張ってください！もっとナーガを倒す必要があります。

English: Collect evidence of defeating at least 1000 Small Naga, Naga, or Captain Naga. After that, defeat the Lord Naga and Overlord Naga.
Japanese: Collect evidence of defeating at least 1000 Small Naga, Naga, or Captain Naga. After that, defeat the Lord Naga and Overlord Naga.

English: Mission Improbable
Japanese: ミッション・インプロバブル

English: Hahaha! I cannot thank you enough for all that you have done for our village, hero! Only the most powerful of masquerpets remain a threat to our village now.
Japanese: ハハハ!英雄よ、あなたが私たちの村のためにしてくれたことすべてに感謝してもしきれません!最強の仮面舞踏会だけが、今や私たちの村にとって脅威であり続けています。

English: We rarely see the Dorian and Okean creatures approach the village. However with so many other Island evils defeated, I fear they may leave their lair to take advantage of the situation!
Japanese: ドリアンとオケアンの生き物が村に近づくのを見ることはめったにありません。しかし、他の多くの島の悪が倒されたので、彼らがこの状況を利用するために隠れ家を離れるのではないかと心配しています!

English: Go seek out where the Dorian and Okean live. We'll need as much information as we can get if we expect to defeat them!
Japanese: ドリアンとオキアンが住んでいる場所を探しに行きます。彼らを倒すには、できるだけ多くの情報が必要です!

English: What!? You can't possibly be scared of a few more masquerpets after all we've been through together!
Japanese: 何！。私たちが一緒に経験してきたすべての後、あなたはおそらくいくつかのより多くの仮面舞踏会を恐れることはできません!

English: Well done, hero! With this information we have a chance to defeat the Dorian and Okean before they can attack!
Japanese: よくやった、ヒーロー!この情報をもとに、ドリアンとオケアンが攻撃してくる前に倒すチャンスがあります!

English: Keep searching, the Dorian and Okean make their homes in the waters of Coral Island.
Japanese: ドリアンとオキアンはコーラル島の海域に住み着きます。

English: Search for where the Dorian and Okean live.
Japanese: ドリアンとオキアンが住んでいる場所を探してください。

English: Surprise Attack!
Japanese: 不意打ち！

English: HOOWAH! I'm trembling with excitement!
Japanese: やれやれ!興奮で震えています!

English: With the information you've brought back, our village has a real chance to take down the Dorian and Okean before they get to us!
Japanese: あなたが持ち帰った情報があれば、私たちの村はドリアンとオキアンが私たちに来る前に倒すチャンスがあります!

English: Go ahead and defeat as many Dorian and Okean as you can find, including their leaders! We trust you to take down the leaders, we'll be helping with the smaller ones in the back.
Japanese: さあ、リーダーを含め、できるだけ多くのドリアンとオキアンを倒してください!リーダーを倒すのは君に任せておけば、後ろの小さなリーダーたちを助けます。

English: If we wait too much longer the Dorian and Okean will attack the village!
Japanese: これ以上待てば、ドリアンとオキアンが村を襲うぞ!!

English: It's been done, hero. We've defeated the Dorian and Okean, and can now rest easy.
Japanese: やったぜ、英雄。ドリアンとオキアンを倒したので、安心できます。

English: We're doomed... without your help we will never defeat the Dorian and Okean in time!
Japanese: 私たちは運命づけられています..あなたの助けがなければ、ドリアンとオケアンを倒すことはできません!

English: Collect trophies from any defeated Dorian and Okean, and defeat at least one Lord or Overlord of each!
Japanese: Collect trophies from any defeated Dorian and Okean, and defeat at least one Lord or Overlord of each!

English: Inky Darkness
Japanese: 漆黒の闇

English: I hope you are ready for our final challenge hero... According to legend, once every few hundred years the Sea King will release spawn onto Coral Island.
Japanese: 最後の挑戦ヒーローの準備ができていることを願っています..。伝説によると、数百年に一度、海王は珊瑚島に産卵を放つと言われています。

English: A strange darkness has began to fill the waters of Coral Island, so it seems as if the legend is true.
Japanese: 珊瑚島の海に奇妙な闇が満ち始めており、伝説が真実であるかのようです。

English: Please help us stave off the spawn of the Sea King!
Japanese: 海王の出現を食い止めるのを手伝ってください!

English: Thank you! Find where the Sea King has released their spawn, and defeat as many as you can. Let BoBu know once you've finished!
Japanese: ありがとうございます！海の王が落とし子を放った場所を見つけて、できるだけ多くを倒してください。終わったらボブに知らせてください!

English: Soon the inky darkness will overflow Coral Island, and we will be engulfed...
Japanese: やがて漆黒の闇が珊瑚島にあふれ、私たちは飲み込まれるだろう。

English: Hohoho! You really do have a mysterious power within you, don't you hero?
Japanese: ほ!あなたは本当にあなたの中に不思議な力を持っていますね、あなたはヒーローですよね?

English: Will we become faceless like those that failed before us?
Japanese: 私たちは、先人たちのように顔が見えなくなってしまうのでしょうか?

English: Defeat 500 of any type of Kraken.
Japanese: いずれかのクラーケンを500体倒す。

English: The Sea King Returns
Japanese: 海王リターンズ

English: The great Sea King of Coral Island has finally returned to wreck havoc upon the land.
Japanese: 珊瑚島の偉大な海王がついに戻ってきて、陸地に大混乱をもたらしました。

English: The locals told me that getting near the beast could cause mortals to lose their mind...
Japanese: 地元の人たちは、獣に近づくと人間が正気を失ってしまう可能性があると教えてくれました。

English: This battle will take all the strength we can muster. If you make it out alive, go back to Darken City, and let the mayor know about all that happened here.
Japanese: この戦いには全力を尽くす必要があります。生きて帰れたら、ダーコンシティへ戻って、ここで起こったことを市長に知らせてください。

English: The only path forward to end the curse of the Sea King is to slay the beast in its lair. Go forth and do the deed, for Coral Island!
Japanese: 海王の呪いを終わらせる唯一の道は、その隠れ家で獣を殺すことです。さあ、珊瑚の島のために行え!

English: Those who lose their mind to the Sea King are said to become faceless.
Japanese: 海王に正気を失った者は、顔が見えなくなるといわれています。

English: Welcome back from Coral Island, hero! And what a story to tell, it's true that Coral Island is a fascinating place.
Japanese: 珊瑚島からおかえりなさい、ヒーロー!そして、コーラル島が魅力的な場所であることは事実です。

English: BoBu and the Coral Island villagers sent something by mail for you as a way to say thanks. Perhaps they were too shy to give it to you themselves!
Japanese: ボブと珊瑚島の村人たちは、感謝の気持ちを込めてメールで送ってくれました。もしかしたら、恥ずかしがり屋で、あなた自身に渡せなかったのかもしれません。

English: The Sea King consumes all who look into the void.
Japanese: 海の王は虚空を覗き込む者を全て飲み込む。

English: Ultimate Crafting
Japanese: 究極のクラフト

English: Orbs of Power
Japanese: 力のオーブ

English: Your arrival has come at a critical time, hero. Bring me Ultima, and in return I shall grant you the key to ultimate power.
Japanese: 英雄よ、君の到着は危機的な時期にやってきた。ウルティマを持ってきてくれ、その見返りに究極の力への鍵を授けよう。

English: Collect Ultima from the giant creatures that live on Coral Island, or from chests of plunder deep in The Wilds.
Japanese: 珊瑚島に生息する巨大な生き物や、荒野の奥深くにある略奪品の宝箱からウルティマを集めましょう。

English: Without Ultima I cannot grant the ultimate power you seek.
Japanese: ウルティマがいなければ、お前が求める究極の力を与えることはできない。

English: Well done, hero... I bestow upon you the power of the Ultimate Orb. Combine this with Shining Oricalkum and obtain ultimate power!
Japanese: よくやった、ヒーロー..究極のオーブの力をあなたに授けます。シャイニング・オリカルクムと合体して究極のパワーを手に入れよう!

English: I need more Ultima to complete the ritual.
Japanese: 儀式を完了するには、ウルティマがもっと必要です。

English: Collect ten Ultima from the giants of Coral Island and treasure chests in The Wilds.
Japanese: 珊瑚島の巨人からウルティマを10個集め、荒野の宝箱を集める。

English: New Hero
Japanese: 新たなヒーローの誕生

English: Your will and ability have proven you to be a master in both thought and deed. Now that you've shown your true strength, it is time for your final task.
Japanese: あなたの意志と能力は、あなたが思考と行動の両方においてマスターであることを証明しています。本当の力を見せつけたところで、いよいよ最後の仕事です。

English: I need you to reach level 125 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!
Japanese: レベル125に到達し、$QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$を持ってきてください。それができるのは本物のヒーローだけです!

English: Reach level 125 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.
Japanese: レベル125に到達し、$QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$をもたらします。

English: New Year's Hunt
Japanese: ニューイヤーハント

English: Celebrating 2024, let's hunt 2024 monsters!\nWhat do you say?"
Japanese: 2024年を記念して、2024年のモンスターを狩りましょう!\n何て言うの?

English: "Great! I know you'll make it for sure!\nHere's to a new year full of adventures in 2024!!!"
Japanese: 「すごい!私はあなたが確かにそれを作ることを知っています!\n 2024年、冒険に満ちた新年を迎えましょう!!

English: "It's a shame, because I've got the best New Year's gift ever…"
Japanese: 「残念です。せっかく最高のお正月のプレゼントをもらったのに...

English: "You've done great~ Here's your New Year's gift~\nLet's see how lucky you are this year!!!"
Japanese: 「よくやったね~お正月のプレゼントよ~\n今年はどれだけラッキーか見てみましょう!!

English: "Are you still a long way off? We're running out of time! Please hurry up!"
Japanese: 「まだ先は長いの?時間切れになってます！お急ぎください!」

English: Defeat the monsters and return to Auxilior.
Japanese: モンスターを倒して補助体に戻る。

English: Collecting Candy Shells
Japanese: キャンディーの殻を集める

English: Madrigal is being polluted by discarded candy shells everywhere!! We need your help!!
Japanese: マドリガルは、いたるところに捨てられたキャンディーの殻で汚染されています!!私たちはあなたの助けを必要としています!

English: Thank you so much!! I won't forget your help!!
Japanese: どうもありがとうございます！！私はあなたの助けを忘れません!

English: I have a special gift for you, but it's a shame...
Japanese: 私はあなたに特別な贈り物を持っていますが、それは残念です...

English: I'm so proud to see Madrigal cleaned up~!
Japanese: マドリガルがきれいになったのを見るのがとても誇らしいです~!

English: Hang in there!!
Japanese: 頑張れ！！

English: Collect the candy shells and return to Auxilior.
Japanese: キャンディーの殻を集めて、ヘルパーに戻ります。

English: Spring Monster Ball
Japanese: 春のモンスターボール

English: Hello Adventurer! Would you like to take a suggestion about hunting a stronger monster?
Japanese: 冒険者の皆さん、こんにちは!より強いモンスターを狩ることについての提案を取りたいですか?

English: Great! Show me what you can do first!
Japanese: すごい！まずは何ができるか教えて!

English: That's too bad, please join us next time!
Japanese: 残念ですが、次回もぜひご参加ください!

English: Thank you. Here is your Monster Ball. Please be cautious!\nNo one knows what kind of powerful monster will come out.
Japanese: ありがとうございます。これがあなたのモンスターボールです。ご注意ください! どんな強力なモンスターが出てくるかは誰にもわかりません。

English: Are we there yet? We don't have much time.
Japanese: もう着きましたか。あまり時間がありません。

English: Complete all 3 missions.
Japanese: 3つのミッションをすべてクリアする。

English: Couple Ring Hunt
Japanese: カップルリングハント

English: If you bring me the coupling, I will give you something really good. Go get it.
Japanese: カップリングを持ってきてくれたら、本当にいいものをあげます。それを手に入れてください。

English: Thanks for granting my request. I've heard through the grapevine that there's been a lot of frauds playing with fake couple rings lately, so you'd better be careful.
Japanese: 私の要求を叶えてくれてありがとう。最近、偽のカップルリングで遊ぶ詐欺が多いと葡萄の木を通して聞いたので、気をつけた方がいいです。

English: What? Where in the world is such a couple ring? So you're saying I'm lying? If you don't believe me, get off!
Japanese: 何。そんなカップルリングは、いったいどこにあるのでしょうか?それで、あなたは私が嘘をついていると言っているのですか?信じられないなら降りろ!

English: Did you manage to get the couple ring already? This is a fake! Didn't I warn you not to get scammed. But I'm giving it to you for your efforts, so take it.
Japanese: カップルリングはもう手に入れましたか?これは偽物です!詐欺に遭わないように警告しませんでしたか。しかし、私はあなたの努力のためにそれを与えているので、それを受け取ってください。

English: Still haven't found the coupling? Hmm...well, that could be... I mean, where would a legendary couple ring be so easy to find?
Japanese: まだカップリングが見つかりませんか?んん。。。まあ、それは...つまり、伝説のカップルリングがこんなに簡単に見つかる場所はどこでしょうか?

English: Hunt the monsters and gather couple rings!
Japanese: モンスターを狩り、カップルリングを集めましょう!

English: Roll your dice
Japanese: Roll your dice

English: Complete all missions.
Japanese: Complete all missions.

English: Couple Daily Quests
Japanese: Couple Daily Quests

English: Hunt the monsters and gather couple rings!
Japanese: モンスターを狩り、カップルリングを集めましょう!

English: I'm so glad to see how in love you are. Go collect $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ from the Nyangnyangs in northern Flaris, then return to me.
Japanese: I'm so glad to see how in love you are. Go collect $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ from the Nyangnyangs in northern Flaris, then return to me.

English: I can feel these charms emitting love waves. Soon everyone will know how special your love is!
Japanese: I can feel these charms emitting love waves. Soon everyone will know how special your love is!

English: I'm sorry, were you unable to find the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$? Perhaps they only appear for those truly in love.
Japanese: I'm sorry, were you unable to find the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$? Perhaps they only appear for those truly in love.

English: Bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me to prove the strength of your love!
Japanese: Bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me to prove the strength of your love!

English: Kill Demian Thieves
Japanese: Kill Demian Thieves

English: Welcome! Another request has come in to clear out $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$. Could you please work together to defeat the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, and return to me once you are done?
Japanese: Welcome! Another request has come in to clear out $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$. Could you please work together to defeat the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, and return to me once you are done?

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted somewhere in Madrigal. Check your map for hints for where they may be hiding!
Japanese: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted somewhere in Madrigal. Check your map for hints for where they may be hiding!

English: The power of your love have vanquished the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ threat, thank you!
Japanese: The power of your love have vanquished the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ threat, thank you!

English: Were you unable to find and defeat $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ yet? Track them down to prove your love is true!
Japanese: Were you unable to find and defeat $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ yet? Track them down to prove your love is true!

English: Find Love Fish
Japanese: Find Love Fish

English: Have you heard of the legendary $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$? Legend has it that lovers who obtain the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ will be together forever.
Japanese: Have you heard of the legendary $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$? Legend has it that lovers who obtain the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ will be together forever.

English: Wonderful! The $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ is said to swim near Zaoma's Refuge in the middle of the Leren Mountains.
Japanese: Wonderful! The $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ is said to swim near Zaoma's Refuge in the middle of the Leren Mountains.

English: You've found the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$! Surely your love will be blessed to last forever.
Japanese: You've found the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$! Surely your love will be blessed to last forever.

English: I don't see the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. If you have trouble finding it, search near Zaoma in the Leren Mountains.
Japanese: I don't see the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. If you have trouble finding it, search near Zaoma in the Leren Mountains.

English: Bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me to prove the strength of your love!
Japanese: Bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me to prove the strength of your love!

English: Kill Giggleboxes
Japanese: Kill Giggleboxes

English: Kill Trangfoma
Japanese: Kill Trangfoma

English: Kill Doridoma
Japanese: Kill Doridoma

English: Kill Scorpicon
Japanese: Kill Scorpicon

English: Kill Tombstone Bearer
Japanese: Kill Tombstone Bearer

English: Kill Cardpuppets
Japanese: Kill Cardpuppets

English: Kill Steam Walkers
Japanese: Kill Steam Walkers

English: Kill Nutty Wheels
Japanese: Kill Nutty Wheels

English: Kill Fefern
Japanese: Kill Fefern

English: Kill Wagsaac
Japanese: Kill Wagsaac

English: Kill Prankster
Japanese: Kill Prankster

English: Collect Whispering Leaves from Risem
Japanese: Collect Whispering Leaves from Risem

English: In their spare time, Risems collect leaves that whisper sweet nothings. Spread love around Madrigal by bringing these $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me!
Japanese: In their spare time, Risems collect leaves that whisper sweet nothings. Spread love around Madrigal by bringing these $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me!

English: I'm so glad to see how in love you are. Go collect $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ from the Risems in Darken, then return to me.
Japanese: I'm so glad to see how in love you are. Go collect $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ from the Risems in Darken, then return to me.

English: Can you hear the leaves speak? Soon everyone will know how special your love is!
Japanese: Can you hear the leaves speak? Soon everyone will know how special your love is!

English: A Date on Mars!
Japanese: A Date on Mars!

English: What could be more romantic than frolicking near the Bangs of Northern Flaris? A picnic outside of Mars Mine sounds outstanding!
Japanese: What could be more romantic than frolicking near the Bangs of Northern Flaris? A picnic outside of Mars Mine sounds outstanding!

English: Wonderful, then the date is set. Enjoy your time sightseeing at the Mars Mine!
Japanese: Wonderful, then the date is set. Enjoy your time sightseeing at the Mars Mine!

English: Not a fan of Bangs? Well, there's always the Nyangnyangs.
Japanese: Not a fan of Bangs? Well, there's always the Nyangnyangs.

English: How was the date? Hopefully the Bangs weren't too distracting.
Japanese: How was the date? Hopefully the Bangs weren't too distracting.

English: Oh, so the Bangs were too distracting after all. Maybe you need to take a cold bath?
Japanese: Oh, so the Bangs were too distracting after all. Maybe you need to take a cold bath?

English: Go on a romantic date outside the entrance of Mars Mine!
Japanese: Go on a romantic date outside the entrance of Mars Mine!

English: Welcome! Another request has come in to clear out $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$. Could you please slay the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, and return to me once you are done?
Japanese: Welcome! Another request has come in to clear out $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$. Could you please slay the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, and return to me once you are done?

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted somewhere in Madrigal.
Japanese: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted somewhere in Madrigal.

English: Some days we don't feel productive. I understand.
Japanese: Some days we don't feel productive. I understand.

English: Collect Rainbow Flowers
Japanese: Collect Rainbow Flowers

English: Welcome! We require flowers blessed by lovers. Could you please collect Rainbow Flowers, and return to me once you are done?
Japanese: Welcome! We require flowers blessed by lovers. Could you please collect Rainbow Flowers, and return to me once you are done?

English: Wonderful! The rare flowers grow near the large tree in Saint Morning where no one flies.
Japanese: Wonderful! The rare flowers grow near the large tree in Saint Morning where no one flies.

English: These flowers are perfect. With your help I can now bless all of Madrigal with love!
Japanese: These flowers are perfect. With your help I can now bless all of Madrigal with love!

English: Oh no, that's not right. The flowers are in Saint Morning. If you get lost, remember to check your map!
Japanese: Oh no, that's not right. The flowers are in Saint Morning. If you get lost, remember to check your map!

English: Head to the Plateau of Silence in Saint Morning, and retrieve the Wild Rainbow Flowers.
Japanese: Head to the Plateau of Silence in Saint Morning, and retrieve the Wild Rainbow Flowers.

English: Collect Heart Charms from Nyangnyang
Japanese: Collect Heart Charms from Nyangnyang

English: Nyangnyangs possess charms bursting with the power of love. With a few of these charms, you can show Madrigal how strong your love is!
Japanese: Nyangnyangs possess charms bursting with the power of love. With a few of these charms, you can show Madrigal how strong your love is!

English: The Mystery of the Shady Eye
Japanese: The Mystery of the Shady Eye

English: The Mystery of the Shady Eye (2)
Japanese: The Mystery of the Shady Eye (2)

English: The Cursed Wing of Destiny
Japanese: The Cursed Wing of Destiny

English: The Cursed Wing of Destiny (2)
Japanese: The Cursed Wing of Destiny (2)

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the sixth floor of the Forsaken Tower.
Japanese: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the sixth floor of the Forsaken Tower.

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the seventh floor of the Forsaken Tower.
Japanese: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted on the seventh floor of the Forsaken Tower.

English: Disarming the Maleficars
Japanese: Disarming the Maleficars

English: Disarming the Maleficars (2)
Japanese: Disarming the Maleficars (2)

English: Stealing gems from the cursed guardian
Japanese: Stealing gems from the cursed guardian

English: Stealing gems from the cursed guardian (2)
Japanese: Stealing gems from the cursed guardian (2)

English: Herbology Class
Japanese: Herbology Class

English: You can gather herbs with a hoe. Want to learn how to gather herbs?
Japanese: You can gather herbs with a hoe. Want to learn how to gather herbs?

English: Good. Then go out into the field and try to gather some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Japanese: Good. Then go out into the field and try to gather some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: There you go. It's easier than you think, isn't it? Just remember, the most important thing is to do 'a lot'.
Japanese: There you go. It's easier than you think, isn't it? Just remember, the most important thing is to do 'a lot'.

English: Woodcutting Class
Japanese: Woodcutting Class

English: You can chop trees with an axe. Would you like to learn woodcutting?
Japanese: You can chop trees with an axe. Would you like to learn woodcutting?

English: Good. Then go out into the field and chop some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Japanese: Good. Then go out into the field and chop some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: Mining Class
Japanese: Mining Class

English: You can dig up ores with a pickaxe. Would you like to learn mining?
Japanese: You can dig up ores with a pickaxe. Would you like to learn mining?

English: Good. Then go out into the field and try to dig some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Japanese: Good. Then go out into the field and try to dig some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: Fishing Class
Japanese: Fishing Class

English: Once you get to know thrill of fishing, it's hard to get away from it. What do you say, learn?
Japanese: Once you get to know thrill of fishing, it's hard to get away from it. What do you say, learn?

English: Good. Then go to the nearest river and try fishing. Whether you succeed or fail, it'll help you a lot.
Japanese: Good. Then go to the nearest river and try fishing. Whether you succeed or fail, it'll help you a lot.

English: Alchemy Class
Japanese: Alchemy Class

English: Once you learn the alchemy, you can brew your own buff potion to carry with. Want to learn?
Japanese: Once you learn the alchemy, you can brew your own buff potion to carry with. Want to learn?

English: Good. Try anything on the caldron nearby. Caldron is near the magic shop.
Japanese: Good. Try anything on the caldron nearby. Caldron is near the magic shop.

English: Cooking Class
Japanese: Cooking Class

English: Food is the basic of survival. Why don't you cook on your own?
Japanese: Food is the basic of survival. Why don't you cook on your own?

English: Good. Try anything on the oven nearby. Oven is near the food shop.
Japanese: Good. Try anything on the oven nearby. Oven is near the food shop.

English: Carpentry Class
Japanese: Carpentry Class

English: You can make furniture out of wood. Would you like to learn carpenting?
Japanese: You can make furniture out of wood. Would you like to learn carpenting?

English: Okay, try anything on the woodcutting tools nearby. The woodcutting tools are near the Housing Manager.
Japanese: Okay, try anything on the woodcutting tools nearby. The woodcutting tools are near the Housing Manager.

English: Smithing Class
Japanese: Smithing Class

English: You can make furniture out of wood. Would you like to learn carpenting?
Japanese: You can make furniture out of wood. Would you like to learn carpenting?

English: Okay, try anything at the nearest crafting tool. The tools are near the jewelry.
Japanese: Okay, try anything at the nearest crafting tool. The tools are near the jewelry.

English: Destroy the pumpkins 1
Japanese: Destroy the pumpkins 1

English: Complete the mission.
Japanese: Complete the mission.

English: Destroy the pumpkins 2
Japanese: Destroy the pumpkins 2

English: Complete the mission.
Japanese: Complete the mission.

English: Thanksgiving Turkey
Japanese: Thanksgiving Turkey

English: Help the mayor cook his turkey for thanksgiving.\nHunt monsters (Lv. -10 to Lv. +10 from your level) to earn [Event] Turkeys.
Japanese: Help the mayor cook his turkey for thanksgiving.\nHunt monsters (Lv. -10 to Lv. +10 from your level) to earn [Event] Turkeys.

English: Hello, adventurer! I'm planning to cook a turkey for the village. Do you have a moment to help?
Japanese: Hello, adventurer! I'm planning to cook a turkey for the village. Do you have a moment to help?

English: Great! Actually, I tried to cook it myself, but while I left the ingredients outside, monsters stole them all! Can you help me get them back?
Japanese: Great! Actually, I tried to cook it myself, but while I left the ingredients outside, monsters stole them all! Can you help me get them back?

English: That's a shame. I'll try to figure something out on my own.
Japanese: That's a shame. I'll try to figure something out on my own.

English: Thank you so much! I can finish cooking in time. Happy Thanksgiving!
Japanese: Thank you so much! I can finish cooking in time. Happy Thanksgiving!

English: Are you done yet? The villagers are eagerly waiting!
Japanese: Are you done yet? The villagers are eagerly waiting!

English: Go out into the field and try to gather some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Japanese: Go out into the field and try to gather some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: Go out into the field and chop some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Japanese: Go out into the field and chop some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: Go out into the field and try to dig some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Japanese: Go out into the field and try to dig some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: Go to the nearest river and try fishing. Whether you succeed or fail, it'll help you a lot.
Japanese: Go to the nearest river and try fishing. Whether you succeed or fail, it'll help you a lot.

English: Try anything on the caldron nearby. Caldron is near the magic shop.
Japanese: Try anything on the caldron nearby. Caldron is near the magic shop.

English: Try anything on the oven nearby. Oven is near the food shop.
Japanese: Try anything on the oven nearby. Oven is near the food shop.

English: Try anything on the woodcutting tools nearby. The woodcutting tools are near the Housing Manager.
Japanese: Try anything on the woodcutting tools nearby. The woodcutting tools are near the Housing Manager.

English: Try anything at the nearest crafting tool. The tools are near the jewelry.
Japanese: Try anything at the nearest crafting tool. The tools are near the jewelry.

English: Hero Grade (2)
Japanese: Hero Grade (2)

English: I need you to reach level 140 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!
Japanese: I need you to reach level 140 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!

English: Reach level 140 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.
Japanese: Reach level 140 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.

English: Hero Grade (3)
Japanese: Hero Grade (3)

English: I need you to reach level 160 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!
Japanese: I need you to reach level 160 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!

English: Reach level 160 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.
Japanese: Reach level 160 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.

English: Rumble from the Depths
Japanese: Rumble from the Depths

English: (H-Hiii…!) T-tremors... w-waves... taller than a Clockworks... (Gulp) A... a deafening noise... Wh-what’s going on?!
Japanese: (H-Hiii…!) T-tremors... w-waves... taller than a Clockworks... (Gulp) A... a deafening noise... Wh-what’s going on?!

English: What?! You’re not aware??! But where have you been?! Honestly… We can never count on you to keep an eye on our precious world…
Japanese: What?! You’re not aware??! But where have you been?! Honestly… We can never count on you to keep an eye on our precious world…

English: Well… listen. It doesn’t matter, I’ll need you. I have no idea what happened, or even where exactly… (hesitation) But I feel like the deafening noise came from the Krakens side.
Japanese: Well… listen. It doesn’t matter, I’ll need you. I have no idea what happened, or even where exactly… (hesitation) But I feel like the deafening noise came from the Krakens side.

English: I would have gone myself, but you see… (looking away) I still have a lot to do, and there are other adventurers I need to take care of… (coughs) And don’t think I’m scared, okay! It has nothing to do with that, absolutely nothing!
Japanese: I would have gone myself, but you see… (looking away) I still have a lot to do, and there are other adventurers I need to take care of… (coughs) And don’t think I’m scared, okay! It has nothing to do with that, absolutely nothing!

English: Find the location of the events and see what’s happening there
Japanese: Find the location of the events and see what’s happening there

English: Ah! Finally, someone reliable! I knew I could count on you. Go quickly, check near the Krakens side, and come back to tell me what you find. I’m sure you’ll do an excellent job! But… be careful, alright? That rumble wasn’t normal...
Japanese: Ah! Finally, someone reliable! I knew I could count on you. Go quickly, check near the Krakens side, and come back to tell me what you find. I’m sure you’ll do an excellent job! But… be careful, alright? That rumble wasn’t normal...

English: What?! You’re not going?! Really… We can’t count on anyone… Fine, do as you wish, but remember that this world needs protectors, not cowards. And don’t come complaining if things get worse without you!
Japanese: What?! You’re not going?! Really… We can’t count on anyone… Fine, do as you wish, but remember that this world needs protectors, not cowards. And don’t come complaining if things get worse without you!

English: Starfish… coral… and all kinds of little sea things coming together to form… a portal?! This is insane… How could this be possible?!
Japanese: Starfish… coral… and all kinds of little sea things coming together to form… a portal?! This is insane… How could this be possible?!

English: You’re back already? But… don’t tell me you haven’t checked out the source of that noise yet! We need to know what’s happening on the Krakens side. Go on, get moving! The world’s not going to protect itself, you know!
Japanese: You’re back already? But… don’t tell me you haven’t checked out the source of that noise yet! We need to know what’s happening on the Krakens side. Go on, get moving! The world’s not going to protect itself, you know!

English: Magic water stone of Herneos
Japanese: Magic water stone of Herneos

English: Hmm… If what you’re telling me is true, it would correspond to a well-known legend of Madrigal… Once upon a time, in the Old World, Herneos was a prosperous city where everyone dreamed of living, a true underwater paradise with magnificent architecture.
Japanese: Hmm… If what you’re telling me is true, it would correspond to a well-known legend of Madrigal… Once upon a time, in the Old World, Herneos was a prosperous city where everyone dreamed of living, a true underwater paradise with magnificent architecture.

English: But one day, Shade pierced the glass bubble that protected Herneos from the depths of the ocean, and the city sank… along with its inhabitants. Since then, despite numerous searches, we have never found this lost city. But if you’re telling me a portal has opened…
Japanese: But one day, Shade pierced the glass bubble that protected Herneos from the depths of the ocean, and the city sank… along with its inhabitants. Since then, despite numerous searches, we have never found this lost city. But if you’re telling me a portal has opened…

English: I’m afraid Shade has finally found a way to return to the city of Herneos… For what purpose? I have no idea, but we need to ensure it is indeed the city of Herneos…
Japanese: I’m afraid Shade has finally found a way to return to the city of Herneos… For what purpose? I have no idea, but we need to ensure it is indeed the city of Herneos…

English: Bring back a magical water stone from the discovered location and have it analyzed by Dr. Estly
Japanese: Bring back a magical water stone from the discovered location and have it analyzed by Dr. Estly

English: Ah, thank you! I knew you’d understand the urgency. If this really is a magical water stone from Herneos, then Shade’s reach might be spreading in ways we never expected… Please, bring back a stone as soon as you can. And be careful Herneos may be more dangerous now than we imagine.
Japanese: Ah, thank you! I knew you’d understand the urgency. If this really is a magical water stone from Herneos, then Shade’s reach might be spreading in ways we never expected… Please, bring back a stone as soon as you can. And be careful Herneos may be more dangerous now than we imagine.

English: What?! You’re not interested in helping with this? You don’t understand this isn’t just some small errand! Herneos could be the key to untold mysteries… and maybe even threats. But fine, if you can’t be bothered, I’ll just have to find someone else…
Japanese: What?! You’re not interested in helping with this? You don’t understand this isn’t just some small errand! Herneos could be the key to untold mysteries… and maybe even threats. But fine, if you can’t be bothered, I’ll just have to find someone else…

English: Ah, you've returned with the magical water stone! Thank you! I'll begin the analysis right away to confirm its origin.
Japanese: Ah, you've returned with the magical water stone! Thank you! I'll begin the analysis right away to confirm its origin.

English: Back so soon? You don’t have the magical water stone yet? We’re counting on that stone to prove if it’s truly from Herneos. Shade’s power might be stronger than we thought, so time is crucial. Please, return as soon as you have it!
Japanese: Back so soon? You don’t have the magical water stone yet? We’re counting on that stone to prove if it’s truly from Herneos. Shade’s power might be stronger than we thought, so time is crucial. Please, return as soon as you have it!

English: Under Shade's Command
Japanese: Under Shade's Command

English: What?! Monsters? Whole hordes?! Listen… Shade must already be at work, and if she’s there, she won’t waste any time.
Japanese: What?! Monsters? Whole hordes?! Listen… Shade must already be at work, and if she’s there, she won’t waste any time.

English: I’ll need you to return there. Observe, fight, assess their strengths… If these creatures are really under Shade’s control, we need to know what awaits us.
Japanese: I’ll need you to return there. Observe, fight, assess their strengths… If these creatures are really under Shade’s control, we need to know what awaits us.

English: When you’ve dealt with the monsters, return to see Dr. Estly. He should have finished the analysis of the water by then, and we’ll finally know if this submerged city is indeed Herneos…
Japanese: When you’ve dealt with the monsters, return to see Dr. Estly. He should have finished the analysis of the water by then, and we’ll finally know if this submerged city is indeed Herneos…

English: Kill $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s, $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT,2$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,2$s, $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT,3$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,3$s and return talk to Sovann.
Japanese: Kill $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s, $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT,2$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,2$s, $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT,3$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,3$s and return talk to Sovann.

English: Excellent! I knew I could count on you. The creatures under Shade’s command won’t go down easily, but with your skills, I’m confident you can handle them. Go, and show them that we won’t back down! Once you've dealt with them, check back with Sovann.
Japanese: Excellent! I knew I could count on you. The creatures under Shade’s command won’t go down easily, but with your skills, I’m confident you can handle them. Go, and show them that we won’t back down! Once you've dealt with them, check back with Sovann.

English: What?! You’re refusing?! Don’t you see how serious this is? Shade’s forces won’t stop they’ll only get stronger if we ignore them. Fine, if you’re not willing to help, I’ll find someone who is up to the challenge. But don’t forget you might regret standing by if Shade succeeds.
Japanese: What?! You’re refusing?! Don’t you see how serious this is? Shade’s forces won’t stop they’ll only get stronger if we ignore them. Fine, if you’re not willing to help, I’ll find someone who is up to the challenge. But don’t forget you might regret standing by if Shade succeeds.

English: You’re back again? But… have you not dealt with those monsters yet? We need to know what we’re up against! Shade’s forces are growing stronger every moment you delay. Go back and finish the job! Time is of the essence, and the fate of Herneos depends on it!
Japanese: You’re back again? But… have you not dealt with those monsters yet? We need to know what we’re up against! Shade’s forces are growing stronger every moment you delay. Go back and finish the job! Time is of the essence, and the fate of Herneos depends on it!

English: You did it! I knew you could handle those monsters! Thank you for stepping up when we needed it the most.
Japanese: You did it! I knew you could handle those monsters! Thank you for stepping up when we needed it the most.

English: Seeking the Truth of Herneos
Japanese: Seeking the Truth of Herneos

English: I’m afraid I don’t have the knowledge necessary to interpret the results correctly.
Japanese: I’m afraid I don’t have the knowledge necessary to interpret the results correctly.

English: Listen, take this sample and bring it to Martinyc the historian of Flarine. Only she has the archives and the skills to compare and tell you what’s going on! If this water is really connected to Herneos, she’ll know.
Japanese: Listen, take this sample and bring it to Martinyc the historian of Flarine. Only she has the archives and the skills to compare and tell you what’s going on! If this water is really connected to Herneos, she’ll know.

English: Take the analysis result to Martinyc the historian of Flarine
Japanese: Take the analysis result to Martinyc the historian of Flarine

English: Thank you! I knew you’d understand the importance of this. Martinyc is our best hope for interpreting these results. Take the sample to her right away, and let’s hope she can shed some light on this mystery! The fate of Herneos could depend on it!
Japanese: Thank you! I knew you’d understand the importance of this. Martinyc is our best hope for interpreting these results. Take the sample to her right away, and let’s hope she can shed some light on this mystery! The fate of Herneos could depend on it!

English: What? You’re turning this down? This is vital information that could unlock the secrets of Herneos! If you won’t help now, I don’t know what we’ll do. Fine, but don’t forget that knowledge is power, and you might regret passing on this opportunity!
Japanese: What? You’re turning this down? This is vital information that could unlock the secrets of Herneos! If you won’t help now, I don’t know what we’ll do. Fine, but don’t forget that knowledge is power, and you might regret passing on this opportunity!

English: You’re back? But… have you not delivered the sample to Martinyc yet? We need her expertise to understand what the analysis reveals! Time is running out, and if this water is connected to Herneos, we need to act quickly. Go now, before it’s too late!
Japanese: You’re back? But… have you not delivered the sample to Martinyc yet? We need her expertise to understand what the analysis reveals! Time is running out, and if this water is connected to Herneos, we need to act quickly. Go now, before it’s too late!

English: Trophies from the Depths
Japanese: Trophies from the Depths

English: Hello, who are you?... Oh, you must be the adventurer Estly told me about! Nice to meet you. How can I assist you?
Japanese: Hello, who are you?... Oh, you must be the adventurer Estly told me about! Nice to meet you. How can I assist you?

English: Oh, you want me to interpret the results of this analysis to check, using the archives, if this water is indeed from the city of Herneos?
Japanese: Oh, you want me to interpret the results of this analysis to check, using the archives, if this water is indeed from the city of Herneos?

English: (Smirking) But nothing comes for free, you know! I heard there are all-new monsters, never seen before, over there…
Japanese: (Smirking) But nothing comes for free, you know! I heard there are all-new monsters, never seen before, over there…

English: While I compare the results, could you bring me samples or souvenirs from each creature? That would allow me to enrich our archives on these strange appearances.
Japanese: While I compare the results, could you bring me samples or souvenirs from each creature? That would allow me to enrich our archives on these strange appearances.

English: Bring back $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$, $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,2$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME,2$, $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,3$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME,3$
Japanese: Bring back $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$, $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,2$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME,2$, $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,3$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME,3$

English: Ah, wonderful! I knew you’d be up for the task. These new creatures are unlike anything we've documented, so any samples you bring will be invaluable. While you’re collecting them, I’ll start the comparison. Come back once you have the items, and we’ll see what these archives reveal about Herneos.
Japanese: Ah, wonderful! I knew you’d be up for the task. These new creatures are unlike anything we've documented, so any samples you bring will be invaluable. While you’re collecting them, I’ll start the comparison. Come back once you have the items, and we’ll see what these archives reveal about Herneos.

English: Really? You’re refusing? (Sighs) I suppose not everyone appreciates the importance of history… But fine, go ahead just remember that these discoveries are rare. Who knows if you'll get another chance to contribute to our knowledge of Herneos.
Japanese: Really? You’re refusing? (Sighs) I suppose not everyone appreciates the importance of history… But fine, go ahead just remember that these discoveries are rare. Who knows if you'll get another chance to contribute to our knowledge of Herneos.

English: Ohhh, thank you for these souvenirs! I can finally… continue my collection... uh, enrich the city archives! (clears throat) Yes, of course, the archives!
Japanese: Ohhh, thank you for these souvenirs! I can finally… continue my collection... uh, enrich the city archives! (clears throat) Yes, of course, the archives!

English: Ah, you’re back? But… I don’t see any of the samples I asked for. These souvenirs from the creatures are essential to my research, you know! Please, gather them quickly and return. The archives await your findings!
Japanese: Ah, you’re back? But… I don’t see any of the samples I asked for. These souvenirs from the creatures are essential to my research, you know! Please, gather them quickly and return. The archives await your findings!

English: Unveiling Herneos
Japanese: Unveiling Herneos

English: Ah, yes, the analysis results… So, according to our archives, the water you retrieved matches 100% with that of the city of Herneos! It is indeed it You should quickly go announce this news to Sovann !
Japanese: Ah, yes, the analysis results… So, according to our archives, the water you retrieved matches 100% with that of the city of Herneos! It is indeed it You should quickly go announce this news to Sovann !

English: Go tell Sovann it is indeed Herneos
Japanese: Go tell Sovann it is indeed Herneos

English: Fantastic! Thank you so much for delivering the news. Sovann will be thrilled or perhaps a bit anxious to hear it. Go quickly and let him know that Herneos has indeed resurfaced. We might be on the brink of something monumental!
Japanese: Fantastic! Thank you so much for delivering the news. Sovann will be thrilled or perhaps a bit anxious to hear it. Go quickly and let him know that Herneos has indeed resurfaced. We might be on the brink of something monumental!

English: Wait… you’re not going to tell him? This is crucial information! Herneos is real, and Sovann needs to know. Fine, if you won’t go, but don’t say I didn’t warn you… Discoveries like this don’t come every day, and neither does the chance to be part of history.
Japanese: Wait… you’re not going to tell him? This is crucial information! Herneos is real, and Sovann needs to know. Fine, if you won’t go, but don’t say I didn’t warn you… Discoveries like this don’t come every day, and neither does the chance to be part of history.

English: What?? It’s really the lost city of Herneos?! (in awe) It’s incredible to see this iconic city again!
Japanese: What?? It’s really the lost city of Herneos?! (in awe) It’s incredible to see this iconic city again!

English: Oh, you’re back… but you still haven’t told Sovann? This is monumental news... Herneos has been confirmed! Please, don’t delay any longer. Sovann must hear this right away; the implications are too important to keep to ourselves!
Japanese: Oh, you’re back… but you still haven’t told Sovann? This is monumental news... Herneos has been confirmed! Please, don’t delay any longer. Sovann must hear this right away; the implications are too important to keep to ourselves!

English: Herneos: The Golden Legacy
Japanese: Herneos: The Golden Legacy

English: Listen, you should check if the treasure is still there! What treasure?! The treasure of Herneos, of course! You can’t miss it: gold, jewels, valuable items... a true legend!
Japanese: Listen, you should check if the treasure is still there! What treasure?! The treasure of Herneos, of course! You can’t miss it: gold, jewels, valuable items... a true legend!

English: So, what are you waiting for? Hurry before Shade gets her hands on it!
Japanese: So, what are you waiting for? Hurry before Shade gets her hands on it!

English: Check if the treasure is still there
Japanese: Check if the treasure is still there

English: Yes! I knew you wouldn’t pass up a chance like this. The treasure of Herneos is the stuff of legends if it’s still there, it could be a discovery of a lifetime! Go quickly, and make sure you get there before Shade does. Good luck!
Japanese: Yes! I knew you wouldn’t pass up a chance like this. The treasure of Herneos is the stuff of legends if it’s still there, it could be a discovery of a lifetime! Go quickly, and make sure you get there before Shade does. Good luck!

English: You’re… refusing? Are you serious?! This is the legendary treasure of Herneos! Opportunities like this don’t come around twice, you know. Fine, but don’t say I didn’t give you the chance to be part of something unforgettable.
Japanese: You’re… refusing? Are you serious?! This is the legendary treasure of Herneos! Opportunities like this don’t come around twice, you know. Fine, but don’t say I didn’t give you the chance to be part of something unforgettable.

English: The treasure is still there?! Great news! But… it’s possible that all is not lost, if we act quickly. Very quickly.
Japanese: The treasure is still there?! Great news! But… it’s possible that all is not lost, if we act quickly. Very quickly.

English: Cutting Shade's Power
Japanese: Cutting Shade's Power

English: I know it’s a lot to ask, but… could you start by eliminating the two generals of Shade’s army that you spotted in Herneos? (determined look) That should slow down Shade’s advance and considerably weaken her right hand.
Japanese: I know it’s a lot to ask, but… could you start by eliminating the two generals of Shade’s army that you spotted in Herneos? (determined look) That should slow down Shade’s advance and considerably weaken her right hand.

English: Kill $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ & $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,2$ the two generals of Shade at Herneos
Japanese: Kill $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ & $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,2$ the two generals of Shade at Herneos

English: Thank you! With Shade’s generals out of the way, we might actually stand a chance. I know it won’t be easy, but you’re the only one who can do it. Go now, and show them that we won’t let Herneos fall under Shade’s control!
Japanese: Thank you! With Shade’s generals out of the way, we might actually stand a chance. I know it won’t be easy, but you’re the only one who can do it. Go now, and show them that we won’t let Herneos fall under Shade’s control!

English: What?! You’re backing out now? This is no time for hesitation! Shade’s forces are closing in, and without your help, we may not be able to hold them back. But fine, if you won’t act, we’ll have to hope someone else is up for the challenge…
Japanese: What?! You’re backing out now? This is no time for hesitation! Shade’s forces are closing in, and without your help, we may not be able to hold them back. But fine, if you won’t act, we’ll have to hope someone else is up for the challenge…

English: What?! You did it already?! (beaming smile) I can’t believe it! It’s incredible to count on you. You’re our true savior!
Japanese: What?! You did it already?! (beaming smile) I can’t believe it! It’s incredible to count on you. You’re our true savior!

English: You’re back... but the two generals of Shade are still standing? Every moment they’re left unchecked, Herneos is at greater risk. We’re counting on you to stop them. There’s no time to lose!
Japanese: You’re back... but the two generals of Shade are still standing? Every moment they’re left unchecked, Herneos is at greater risk. We’re counting on you to stop them. There’s no time to lose!

English: The Final Battle for Herneos
Japanese: The Final Battle for Herneos

English: Now that you’ve weakened the boss by taking out the two generals of Shade’s army, it would be wise for you to face her right hand before he regains his full power.
Japanese: Now that you’ve weakened the boss by taking out the two generals of Shade’s army, it would be wise for you to face her right hand before he regains his full power.
